ing: 1/2 cup cucumber - peeled, seeded and chopped
des: "A great, fruity accompaniment for chicken breasts. Viva la salsa!"
ins: In a large nonporous glass bowl combine the kiwi, peaches/nectarines/apricots, jalapeno chile pepper, cucumber, onion, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Mix all together. Cover bowl and refrigerate overnight.
